title: Doin' It Again [Blu-ray]
description: 50th Anniversary - 1st album of new material in 20 years That s Why God Made The Radio to kickoff worldwide tourLive Performances and never-before-seen footage from the 1966 'Good Vibrations' recording sessionsBehind-the-scenes footage from the 2012 recording sessions for the new Beach Boys release That s Why God Made The Radio The group s moving tributes to founding members Carl and Dennis Wilson Exclusive 2012 interviewsThe Beach Boys are America s most successful band. With 56 U.S. Top 100 hits, 36 Top Ten Hits and 4 Number One singles
